  \noindent

    \item Led development of microservices architecture serving 10M+ users, improving system reliability by 40\%

    \item Mentored team of 5 junior engineers, conducting code reviews and technical design sessions
    \item Reduced deployment time by 60\% through implementation of automated CI/CD pipelines
  \end{itemize}
  \vspace{4pt}
  \noindent
  \textbf{StartupXYZ} \hfill Jun 2019 - Dec 2020

  \textit{Software Engineer} | New York, NY
  \vspace{1pt}
  \begin{itemize}[leftmargin=0.15in]\tightitem

    \item Implemented authentication and authorization system using OAuth 2.0 and JWT
    \item Optimized database queries reducing response time by 70\%
